Class Ride

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ride

  • public class Ride
extends java.lang.Object
    Model the rides. A ride holds the starting and finishing coordinates of the ride, the earliest start step, and the latest finish step.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ride(int rid, Location pickup, Location destination, int earliestStart, int latestFinish)

      Location getDestination() 
      int getEarliestStart() 
      int getLatestFinish() 
      Location getPickupLocation() 
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return details of this ride, such as where the starting point and finishing point are.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ride

        public Ride(int rid,
            Location pickup,
            Location destination,
            int earliestStart,
            int latestFinish)
        Parameters:
        rid - the ID of this ride
        pickup - the location of the starting point
        destination - the location of the finishing point
        earliestStart - the earliest start of the ride
        latestFinish - the latest finish of the ride
